word:
(A) The Positive 

               (Words of Privilege and Counsel) 


     Jesus and the Family Relationship.--Jesus did not enforce celibacy upon any class of men. He came not to destroy the sacred relationship of marriage but to exalt it and restore it to its original sanctity. He looks with pleasure upon the family relationship where sacred and unselfish love bears sway.--MS 126, 1903. (AH 121.)
